content:
Two women were injured as a result of enemy shelling of Guliaypol in the Zaporozhye region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

The invaders have again directed their artillery on frontline settlements.

The afternoon fired Gulyaypole and wounded two local residents - 63 and 77 years.

The police provided women with domestic help and sent to the hospital.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of the Russian attack in Kryvyi Rih on Tuesday nightThere are deadBut the victims.
title: The invaders fired at Gulyaypole's artillery, two women were injured
description: The head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov informed about it. The invaders have been directed again ...
author: Army Inform
